subject: Spring Seminar Schedule
body:
Upcoming Seminars
Register 
          today for one of these CPE approved programs, and team up with the leader in electric power 
          and energy education.
















Live 
                                Phone & Web Seminars


 Click Here to Learn More



1.
The Fundamentals of Gas and Electric Utility Rates 
                              Two 90 minute sessions – May 11  


2.
Carbon Market Developments 
                              One 105 minute session – May 16  


3.
Introduction to Heat Rates, Spark Spreads, Generation Optionality, Tolling & Heat Rate Linked Power Transactions
                              Two 90 minute sessions – May 31 


4.
Fundamentals of the Energy & Electric Financial Markets 
                              Two 90 minute sessions   – June 21 


5.
Fundamentals of the U.S. Electric Service System  - Part I of a two-part series.
                              Two 90 minute sessions – June 27 


6.
Understanding Today's U.S. Electric Power Industry - Part II of a two-part series.
                              Two 90 minute sessions – June 28  
















 In-Depth Classroom Programs



 Click Here to Learn More



1.
Introduction to Carbon Market Trading and Finance May 2, New York City - The Torch Club (NYU   Campus) 


2.
Understanding Today's Natural Gas & LNG   Industry  May 15 & 16, Houston - Doubletree Galleria  


3.
Understanding Today's U.S. Electric Power Industry, ISOs & the Basics of   Wholesale Power Transactions May 15, Houston - Doubletree Galleria 


4.
Strategic Supply Sourcing for the Energy & Electric Power Industries May 16, Houston - Doubletree Galleria 


5.
The Fundamentals of Energy and Electric Power Futures, Options   and Derivatives May 16 & 17, Houston - Doubletree Galleria 


6.
Fundamentals of Heat Rates, Spark Spreads, Generation Optionality, Tolling Arrangements, Heat Rate Linked Power Transactions, Spread Options & How to Hedge & Monetize Electric Generation Assets May 18, Houston - Doubletree Galleria 


7.
Understanding Today's U.S. Electric Power Industry, ISOs & the Basics of   Wholesale Power Transactions June 12, Philadelphia - Crown Plaza City Center


8.
Understanding Today's  Natural Gas & LNG   Industry June 12 & 13, Philadelphia - Crown Plaza City Center


9.
The Fundamentals of Energy and Electric Power Futures, Options   and Derivatives June 13 & 14, Philadelphia - Crown Plaza City Center and June 26 & 27, Calgary - Four Points Sheraton Calgary West


10.
The Fundamentals of Gas & Electric Utility Rates June 13 & 14, Philadelphia - Crown Plaza City Center
